1. Launch CAPH (go to the installation directory and click the application icon or use the Task Bar)
2. Open an example project (File menu > Open Project or Ctl-P, then select the .cphpro file in the project directory)
3. To view the dataflow graph hit the "Graph" button
3. To simulate the design hit the "Simu" button
4. To generate the SystemC code hit the "SystemC" button
5. To generate the VHDL code hit the "VHDL" button
6. The generated code is written in the "systemc" (resp. "vhdl") sub-directory
